typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
Employee split(equals(deptId, '1'),
	equals(deptId, '2'),
	equals(deptId, '3'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSpilDeptId@(HR, Accounts, IT, PAYROLL)
